name: SubmissionRoundLimit
description: Sets limits for maximum submissions in a SubmissionRound

totalSubmissionLimit.description: The maximum total number of submissions per team/participant for the entirety of the round.

dailySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum total number of submissions per team/participant for each day of the round.

weeklySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum total number of submissions per team/participant for every 7 days of the round.

monthlySubmissionLimit.description: The maximum total number of submissions per team/participant per month. Unlike other limits, this can be configured to reset on the n-th day of every month.
